sentences.sContent: Istara: It would suit a famous samurai like you.
sentences.sContent_eng: Istara: It would suit a famous samurai like you.
sentences.sCn: 这绝对适合像你这么著名的武士。

sentences.sContent: In Japan, only a talented samurai can break through the ninjas.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Japan, only a talented samurai can break through the ninjas.
sentences.sCn: 在日本，只有一个有才华的武士可以通过忍者突破。

sentences.sContent: But by 1638 thousands of the peasants and their samurai mercenaries had been slaughtered.
sentences.sContent_eng: But by 1638 thousands of the peasants and their samurai mercenaries had been slaughtered.
sentences.sCn: 但是在1638年之前，数千农民和他们的佣兵武士都被屠戮。

remMethod.val: 来自日语， 指推崇武士道的人

trans.tranOther: a member of a powerful military class in Japan in the past
